name: The MidWest Warrior
description:
This is my first full-feature Unity-based offering.

It is a simple 2D Space Shooter as taught by GameDevHQ.

This particular project showcases my current ability and knowledge.

Few of the visual assets are mine but the behaviors have all been coded by me with a great deal of direction from Mr. Heck, Mr. Kessler and Unity.

Thank you all!
